query: 2022年12月自主品牌、合资品牌渗透率？
sql:
SELECT YEAR
	,
	MONTH,
	manufacturer_type,
	sum( sales ) / ( SELECT sum( sales ) FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE YEAR = 2022 AND MONTH = 12 ) AS penetration_rate 
FROM
	new_energy_vehicle_model_sales 
WHERE
	YEAR = 2022 
	AND MONTH = 12 
	AND manufacturer_type IN ( '自主', '合资' ) 
	AND sale_type = '零售量'
GROUP BY
	YEAR,
	MONTH,
	manufacturer_type

query: 2022年新能源乘用车累计销量及同比？
sql:
SELECT
  t1.year AS 年度,
  ROUND(t1.val, 2) AS 销量,
  CONCAT(ROUND((t1.val - t2.val) / t2.val * 100, 2), '%') AS 同比
FROM
(
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS val
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year * 100 + month BETWEEN 2022 * 100 + 1
    AND 2022 * 100 + 12
  GROUP BY
    year
) t1
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS val
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year * 100 + month BETWEEN (2022 -1) * 100 + 1
    AND (2022 -1) * 100 + 12
  GROUP BY
    year
) t2
ON t1.year = t2.year + 1

  ROUND(SUM(phev_sales) + SUM(bev_sales), 2) AS 新能源销量,
  ROUND(
    SUM(passenger_car_sales) - SUM(phev_sales) - SUM(bev_sales),
    2
  ) AS 燃油车销量
FROM
  new_energy_vehicle_sales
WHERE
  year = 2022
  AND month BETWEEN 7 AND 12

query: 2022年10月、11月、12月中国新能源乘用车渗透率分别是多少？
sql:
SELECT
  a.year AS 年度,
  a.month AS 月度,
  (a.sales / b.passenger_car_sales) AS 渗透率
FROM
(
  SELECT
    year,
    month,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2022
    AND month IN (10, 11, 12)
  GROUP BY
    year,
    month
) a
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    year,
    month,
    passenger_car_sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2022
    AND month IN (10, 11, 12)
) b
ON a.year = b.year
AND a.month = b.month

query: 2022年10-12月中国新能源乘用车渗透率分别是多少？
sql:
SELECT
  a.year AS 年度,
  a.month AS 月度,
  a.sales / b.sales AS 渗透率
FROM
(
  SELECT
    year,
    month,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2022
    AND month BETWEEN 10 AND 12
  GROUP BY
    year,
    month
) a
JOIN (
  SELECT
    year,
    month,
    SUM(passenger_car_sales) AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2022
    AND month BETWEEN 10 AND 12
  GROUP BY
    year,
    month
) b
ON a.year = b.year
AND a.month = b.month

query: 2022年8月中国燃油乘用车和新能源乘用车销量占比分别是多少？
sql:
SELECT
  YEAR,
  SUM(passenger_car_sales - nev_sales) AS 'passenger_car_sales - nev_sales销量',
  SUM(nev_sales) AS 'nev_sales销量',
  CONCAT(
    ROUND(
      SUM(passenger_car_sales - nev_sales) / SUM(passenger_car_sales) * 100,
      2
    ),
    '%'
  ) AS 'passenger_car_sales - nev_sales占比',
  CONCAT(
    ROUND(SUM(nev_sales) / SUM(passenger_car_sales) * 100, 2),
    '%'
  ) AS 'nev_sales占比'
FROM
  new_energy_vehicle_sales
WHERE
  year * 100 + month BETWEEN 2022 * 100 + 8
  AND 2022 * 100 + 8
GROUP BY
  YEAR
ORDER BY
  YEAR

query: 2022年1-8月燃油乘用车累计销量及同比？
sql:
SELECT
  t1.year AS 年度,
  ROUND(t1.val, 2) AS 销量,
  CONCAT(ROUND((t1.val - t2.val) / t2.val * 100, 2), '%') AS 同比
FROM
(
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(passenger_car_sales - nev_sales) AS val
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year * 100 + month BETWEEN 2022 * 100 + 1
    AND 2022 * 100 + 8
  GROUP BY
    year
) t1
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(passenger_car_sales - nev_sales) AS val
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year * 100 + month BETWEEN (2022 -1) * 100 + 1
    AND (2022 -1) * 100 + 8
  GROUP BY
    year
) t2
ON t1.year = t2.year + 1

query: 2020-2022年，中国新能源乘用车销量及渗透率？
sql:
SELECT
  year AS 年份,
  ROUND(SUM(nev_sales), 2) AS 销量,
  ROUND(SUM(nev_sales) / SUM(passenger_car_sales), 2) AS 渗透率
FROM
  new_energy_vehicle_sales
WHERE
  year * 100 + month BETWEEN 2020 * 100 + 1
  AND 2022 * 100 + 12
GROUP BY
  year

query: 2022年6月新能源渗透率

query: 2023年沃尔沃月度零售量及同比，环比
sql: SELECT t.YEAR AS 年度,t.MONTH AS 月度,t.sales AS 销量,ROUND((t.sales-t2.sales)/t2.sales,4) AS 同比,ROUND(IFNULL((t.sales-t3.sales)/t3.sales,(t.sales-t4.sales)/t4.sales),4) AS 环比 FROM (SELECT YEAR,MONTH,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE YEAR=2023 AND MONTH>=1 AND MONTH<=12 AND brand_name='沃尔沃' AND sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,MONTH) t LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR,MONTH,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,MONTH) t2 ON t.YEAR-1=t2.YEAR AND t.MONTH=t2.MONTH LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR,MONTH,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,MONTH) t3 ON t.YEAR=t3.YEAR AND t.MONTH-1=t3.MONTH LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR,MONTH,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,MONTH) t4 ON t.YEAR-1=t4.YEAR AND t.MONTH+11=t4.MONTH

query: 2023年各车型销量 及同比
sql: SELECT t1.YEAR AS 年度,t1.car_type AS 车型,t1.sales AS 销量,ROUND((t1.sales-t2.sales)/t2.sales,4) AS 同比 FROM (SELECT YEAR,car_type,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE YEAR=2023 AND sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,car_type) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR,car_type,SUM(sales) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_model_sales WHERE YEAR=2022 AND sale_type='零售量' GROUP BY YEAR,car_type) t2 ON t1.YEAR=t2.YEAR+1 AND t1.car_type=t2.car_type

query: 2021年 整体乘用车5月份销量 及同比，环比
sql:
select 
            t1.year,
            t1.month,
            t1.sales,
            round((t1.sales - t2.sales) / t2.sales, 4) as yoy,
            round((t1.sales - t3.sales) / t3.sales, 4) as mom
        from
            (select year, month, passenger_car_sales as sales from new_energy_vehicle_sales where year = 2021 and month = 5) t1
        left join
            (select year, month, passenger_car_sales as sales from new_energy_vehicle_sales) t2
        on
            t1.year - 1 = t2.year and
            t1.month = t2.month
        left join
            (select year, month, passenger_car_sales as sales from new_energy_vehicle_sales) t3
        on
            t1.year = t3.year and
            t1.month - 1 = t3.month

query: 2021年 整体乘用车年度销量 及同比
sql: SELECT t1.YEAR AS 年度,ROUND(t1.val,2) AS 销量,CONCAT(ROUND((t1.val-t2.val)/t2.val*100,2),'%') AS 同比 FROM (SELECT YEAR,SUM(passenger_car_sales) AS val FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR*100+month BETWEEN 2021*100+1 AND 2021*100+12 GROUP BY YEAR) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR,SUM(passenger_car_sales) AS val FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR*100+month BETWEEN (2021-1)*100+1 AND (2021-1)*100+12 GROUP BY YEAR) t2 ON t1.YEAR=t2.YEAR+1

query: 2023年 nev 销量 及 同比
sql:
SELECT t.year, t.SALES, (t.SALES / t1.SALES) AS yoy 
FROM (SELECT year, SUM(nev_sales) AS SALES 
      FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t 
      WHERE year = 2023
      GROUP BY year) t 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT year, SUM(nev_sales) AS SALES 
           FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t 
           GROUP BY year) t1 on t.year-1 = t1.year

query: 2023年1-4月整体乘用车年度累计销量及同比
sql:
SELECT t.YEAR, t.SALES, CONCAT( ROUND(( ( t.SALES - t1.SALES ) / t1.SALES * 100 ),
                2 
                ),
        '%' 
) AS yoy 
FROM
        ( SELECT YEAR, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS SALES FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH BETWEEN 1 AND 4 GROUP BY YEAR ) t
        LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS SALES FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t WHERE YEAR = 2022 AND MONTH BETWEEN 1 AND 4 GROUP BY YEAR ) t1 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t1.YEAR

query: 2022年 nev年度累计销量及同比
sql:
SELECT t.YEAR, ROUND( t.SALES, 2 ) AS sales, CONCAT( ROUND((( t.SALES / t1.SALES ) - 1 ) * 100,
                2 
                ),
        '%' 
) AS yoy 
FROM
        ( SELECT YEAR, SUM( nev_sales ) AS SALES FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t WHERE YEAR = 2022 GROUP BY YEAR ) t
        LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, SUM( nev_sales ) AS SALES FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales t GROUP BY YEAR ) t1 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t1.YEAR

query: 统计2023年BEV每月的销量、同比、环比情况
sql:
SELECT
        t3.`YEAR`,
        t3.`MONTH`,
        t3.sales,
        CONCAT( ROUND( t3.mom, 2 ), '%' ) AS mom,
        CONCAT( ROUND( t4.yoy, 2 ), '%' ) AS yoy 
FROM
        (
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH + 1 AS MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 ON t2.MONTH = t1.MONTH UNION
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH = 1 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 - 1 AND `month` = 12 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 
        ) t3
        JOIN (
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS yoy 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
        LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH AS MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2022 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 ON t1.MONTH = t2.MONTH 
        ) t4 ON t3.`MONTH` = t4.`MONTH`

query: 统计2023年BEV每月销量及环比情况
sql:
SELECT
        t.`YEAR`,
        t.`MONTH`,
        t.sales,
        CONCAT( ROUND( t.mom, 2 ), '%' ) AS mom 
FROM
        (
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH + 1 AS MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 ON t2.MONTH = t1.MONTH UNION
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH = 1 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 - 1 AND `month` = 12 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 
        ) t 
ORDER BY
        t.MONTH

query: 2023年1-4月 乘用车销量，同比，环比
sql:
SELECT
	t3.`YEAR`,
	t3.`MONTH`,
	t3.sales,
	CONCAT( ROUND( t3.mom, 2 ), '%' ) AS mom,
	CONCAT( ROUND( t4.yoy, 2 ), '%' ) AS yoy 
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		t1.`YEAR`,
		t1.`MONTH`,
		t1.sales,
		(( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
	FROM
		( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND `month` BETWEEN 1 AND 4 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
		JOIN (
		SELECT YEAR
			,
			MONTH + 1 AS MONTH,
			SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales 
		FROM
			new_energy_vehicle_sales 
		WHERE
			YEAR = 2023 
			AND `month` BETWEEN 1 
			AND 4 
		GROUP BY
			YEAR,
		MONTH 
		) t2 ON t2.MONTH = t1.MONTH UNION
	SELECT
		t1.`YEAR`,
		t1.`MONTH`,
		t1.sales,
		(( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
	FROM
		( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH = 1 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
		JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 - 1 AND `month` = 12 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 
	) t3
	JOIN (
	SELECT
		t1.`YEAR`,
		t1.`MONTH`,
		t1.sales,
		(( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS yoy 
	FROM
		( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND `month` BETWEEN 1 AND 4 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
	LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH AS MONTH, SUM( passenger_car_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2022 AND `month` BETWEEN 1 AND 4 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 ON t1.MONTH = t2.MONTH 
	) t4 ON t3.`MONTH` = t4.`MONTH`

query: 2020到2022年，各能源类型的CAGR分别是多少？
sql:
SELECT 
  'passenger_car_sales' as type,
  POWER(SUM(IF(`year`=2022, `passenger_car_sales`, 0)) / SUM(IF(`year`=2020, `passenger_car_sales`, 0)), 1/(2022 - 2020)) - 1 as CAGR
FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'bev_sales',
  POWER(SUM(IF(`year`=2022, `bev_sales`, 0)) / SUM(IF(`year`=2020, `bev_sales`, 0)), 1/(2022 - 2020)) - 1
FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'phev_sales',
  POWER(SUM(IF(`year`=2022, `phev_sales`, 0)) / SUM(IF(`year`=2020, `phev_sales`, 0)), 1/(2022 - 2020)) - 1
FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'nev_sales',
  POWER(SUM(IF(`year`=2022, `nev_sales`, 0)) / SUM(IF(`year`=2020, `nev_sales`, 0)), 1/(2022 - 2020)) - 1
FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales
;

 year,
 brand_name
from new_energy_vehicle_model_sales
where year = 2022
and max_price<= 20
and min_price>= 18
and energy_type='新能源'
and sale_type='零售量'
group by year ,brand_name

a.city_level,

	where year = 2022
and energy_type = '新能源'
)b on 1=1

query: 2023年1-4月 整体乘用车销量及同比，环比是多少？
sql:
SELECT
	t.YEAR,
	t.MONTH,
	t.sales,
	round(( t.sales - t2.sales )/ t2.sales, 4 ) AS yoy,
	round( ifnull(( t.sales - t3.sales )/ t3.sales,( t.sales - t4.sales )/ t4.sales ), 4 ) AS mom
FROM
	( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, passenger_car_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH >= 1 and MONTH <= 4 ) t
	LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, passenger_car_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales ) t2 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t2.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH = t2.
	MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, passenger_car_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH,sales ) t3 ON t.YEAR = t3.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH - 1 = t3.
	MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, passenger_car_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH,sales ) t4 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t4.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH + 11 = t4.MONTH

query: 2023年新能源车月度销量及渗透率是多少？
sql:
SELECT
  year,
  month,
  SUM(nev_sales) AS sales,
  SUM(nev_sales) / SUM(passenger_car_sales) permeability
FROM
  new_energy_vehicle_sales
WHERE
  year = 2023
GROUP BY
  year,
  month
ORDER BY
  month

query: 2023年1-4月 整体乘用车年度累计销量及同比是多少？
sql:
SELECT
	t3.YEAR,
	t3.MONTH,
	t3.ytd,
	( t3.ytd - t4.ytd ) / t4.ytd AS yoy
FROM
	(
	SELECT
		t.YEAR,
		t.MONTH,
		sum( t2.passenger_car_sales ) AS ytd
	FROM
		new_energy_vehicle_sales t
		LEFT JOIN new_energy_vehicle_sales t2 ON t.YEAR = t2.YEAR
		AND t.`month` >= t2.`month`
	WHERE
		t.YEAR = 2023
		AND t.MONTH >= 1 and t.MONTH <= 4
	GROUP BY
		t.YEAR,
		t.MONTH
	) t3
	LEFT JOIN (
	SELECT
		t.YEAR,
		t.MONTH,
		sum( t2.passenger_car_sales ) AS ytd
	FROM
		new_energy_vehicle_sales t
		LEFT JOIN new_energy_vehicle_sales t2 ON t.YEAR = t2.YEAR
		AND t.`month` >= t2.`month`
	WHERE
		t.YEAR = YEAR(DATE_SUB('2023-01-01 08:00:00', INTERVAL 1 YEAR))
		AND t.MONTH >= 1 and t.MONTH <= 4
	GROUP BY
		t.YEAR,
		t.MONTH
	) t4 ON t3.YEAR - 1 = t4.YEAR
	AND t3.MONTH = t4.MONTH

query: 2022年 nev月度销量及同比，环比是多少？
sql:
SELECT
	t.YEAR,
	t.MONTH,
	t.sales,
	round(( t.sales - t2.sales )/ t2.sales, 4 ) AS yoy,
	round( ifnull(( t.sales - t3.sales )/ t3.sales,( t.sales - t4.sales )/ t4.sales ), 4 ) AS mom
FROM
	( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, nev_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2022 ) t
	LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, nev_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales ) t2 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t2.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH = t2.
	MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, nev_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH, sales ) t3 ON t.YEAR = t3.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH - 1 = t3.
	MONTH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, nev_sales AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH, sales ) t4 ON t.YEAR - 1 = t4.YEAR
	AND t.MONTH + 11 = t4.MONTH

query: 2023年1-4月，新能源轿车、新能源SUV、新能源MPV零售量分别为多少？

query: 2023年新能源车销量及同比
sql:
SELECT
  t1.year as 年度,
  t1.nev_sales as 销量,
  ROUND((t1.nev_sales - t2.nev_sales) / t2.nev_sales, 4) AS 同比
FROM
(
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS nev_sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2023
  GROUP BY
    year
) t1
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    year,
    SUM(nev_sales) AS nev_sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    year = 2022
  GROUP BY
    year
) t2
ON t1.year = t2.year + 1

query: 统计2023年bev每月销量及环比情况
sql:
SELECT
        t.`YEAR`,
        t.`MONTH`,
        t.sales,
        CONCAT( ROUND( t.mom, 2 ), '%' ) AS mom 
FROM
        (
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH + 1 AS MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 ON t2.MONTH = t1.MONTH UNION
        SELECT
                t1.`YEAR`,
                t1.`MONTH`,
                t1.sales,
                (( t1.sales - t2.sales ) / t2.sales * 100 ) AS mom 
        FROM
                ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 AND MONTH = 1 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t1
                JOIN ( SELECT YEAR, MONTH, SUM( bev_sales ) AS sales FROM new_energy_vehicle_sales WHERE YEAR = 2023 - 1 AND `month` = 12 GROUP BY YEAR, MONTH ) t2 
        ) t 
ORDER BY
        t.MONTH

      THEN sales
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS suv销量,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN car_type = 'MPV'
      THEN sales
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS mpv销量
FROM
  new_energy_vehicle_model_sales
WHERE
  sale_type = '零售量'
  AND year = 2022
  AND energy_type = '新能源'
GROUP BY
  年度

query: 2023年1-4月 新能源车销量，同比，环比
sql:
SELECT
  t.YEAR AS 年度,
  t.MONTH AS 月度,
  t.sales AS 销量,
  ROUND((t.sales - t2.sales) / t2.sales, 4) AS 同比,
  ROUND(
    IFNULL(
      (t.sales - t3.sales) / t3.sales,
      (t.sales - t4.sales) / t4.sales
    ),
    4
  ) AS 环比
FROM
(
  SELECT
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    nev_sales AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  WHERE
    YEAR = 2023
    AND MONTH >= 1
    AND MONTH <= 4
) t
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    nev_sales AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
) t2
ON t.YEAR - 1 = t2.YEAR
AND t.MONTH = t2.MONTH
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    nev_sales AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  GROUP BY
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    sales
) t3
ON t.YEAR = t3.YEAR
AND t.MONTH - 1 = t3.MONTH
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    nev_sales AS sales
  FROM
    new_energy_vehicle_sales
  GROUP BY
    YEAR,
    MONTH,
    sales
) t4
ON t.YEAR - 1 = t4.YEAR
AND t.MONTH + 11 = t4.MONTH
